NODE.title: htmlpage display page
NODE.field:
pagetype: [% my $NODE = $this->get_node; my $USER = $this->get_user; my $query = $this->get_query; my $THEME = $this->get_theme; my %HTMLVARS = %{ $this->get_htmlvars }; my $VARS = $this->get_vars; my $DB = $this->get_nodebase; my %GLOBAL; my $N = $DB->getNodeById($$NODE{pagetype_nodetype}, 'light'); linkNode $N; %]
parent container: [% my $NODE = $this->get_node; my $USER = $this->get_user; my $query = $this->get_query; my $THEME = $this->get_theme; my %HTMLVARS = %{ $this->get_htmlvars }; my $VARS = $this->get_vars; my $DB = $this->get_nodebase; my %GLOBAL; return linkNode ($$NODE{parent_container}) if $$NODE{parent_container}; return "none"; %]
displaytype: [% my $NODE = $this->get_node; my $USER = $this->get_user; my $query = $this->get_query; my $THEME = $this->get_theme; my %HTMLVARS = %{ $this->get_htmlvars }; my $VARS = $this->get_vars; my $DB = $this->get_nodebase; my %GLOBAL; $$NODE{displaytype} %]
MIME type: [% my $NODE = $this->get_node; my $USER = $this->get_user; my $query = $this->get_query; my $THEME = $this->get_theme; my %HTMLVARS = %{ $this->get_htmlvars }; my $VARS = $this->get_vars; my $DB = $this->get_nodebase; my %GLOBAL; $$NODE{MIMEtype} %]
theme: [% my $NODE = $this->get_node; my $USER = $this->get_user; my $query = $this->get_query; my $THEME = $this->get_theme; my %HTMLVARS = %{ $this->get_htmlvars }; my $VARS = $this->get_vars; my $DB = $this->get_nodebase; my %GLOBAL; unless ($$NODE{ownedby_theme}) { return "this htmlpage does not belong to a theme"; } my $THEME = getNode $$NODE{ownedby_theme}; linkNode($THEME); %]
Permission needed: [% my $NODE = $this->get_node; my $USER = $this->get_user; my $query = $this->get_query; my $THEME = $this->get_theme; my %HTMLVARS = %{ $this->get_htmlvars }; my $VARS = $this->get_vars; my $DB = $this->get_nodebase; my %GLOBAL; my $trans = { 'r' => "read", 'w' => "write", 'x' => "execute", 'd' => "delete", 'c' => "create" }; $$trans{$$NODE{permissionneeded}}; %]

Code:
[{listcode:page}]
